format: A data frame containing 254,654 (and 30,000, respectively) observations on 8 variables.
description:
Description
Cross-section data from the 1980 US Census on married women
aged 21–35 with two or more children.
title: Fertility and Women's Labor Supply
reference: Fertility2 is a random subset of Fertility with 30,000 observations.

parameters.gender2: factor indicating gender of second child.
parameters.morekids: factor. Does the mother have more than 2 children?
parameters.gender1: factor indicating gender of first child.
parameters.other:
factor. Is the mother's ethnicity neither African-American nor
Hispanic, nor Caucasian? (see below)
parameters.work: number of weeks in which the mother worked in 1979.
